Module f22_hw06_comp310_f22_hw06_03

Package model.strategies.criteria

package model.strategies.criteria
  • Class
    Description
    CollisionStrategy
    A strategy where the criteria is collision.
    ColorMatch
    A strategy where the criteria is similar colors.
    CompositeCriteriaStrategy
    A strategy composed of two criteria strategies.
    ErrorCriteriaStrategy
    A strategy to handle errors.
    EverywhereStrategy
    A strategy for the ball to interact with everything, everywhere.
    ICriteriaStrategy
    An interface for criteria strategies.
    ProximityStrategy
    A strategy for an AOE criteria.
    SameTypeStrategy
    A strategy where the criteria is configurable for the same type of ball.
